meanings.definition: A series of flat areas on a slope for cultivation or recreation.
meanings.sent1: The farmers planted crops on the terraces to make good use of the land.
meanings.sent2: The terraces provided perfect spots for picnics and outdoor games.
meanings.sent3: The terraces looked like giant steps leading up the hill, making it a fun climb.
meanings.sent4: The terraces resembled a giant staircase carved into the side of the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The terraces created a beautiful pattern on the hillside, like a patchwork quilt.

meanings.definition: A row of houses on a raised area of land.
meanings.sent1: The terraces along the hillside offered stunning views of the valley below.
meanings.sent2: The terraces were lined with cozy houses, each with its own garden.
meanings.sent3: The terraces of houses made the neighborhood look like a mini village.
meanings.sent4: The terraces of homes cascaded down the hill like a colorful waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The terraces of houses created a charming and unique community atmosphere.
